description: This table contains death type abstracting information from the hospital account. It is possible for multiple death types to be abstracted on a single account.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with associated death-type information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Because multiple death types can apply to a patient and be stored in one hospital account, each abstracted death type will have a unique line number.

columns.name: DEATH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This abstracting item indicates the death type that is associated with a particular account and line.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
